Table	Create Table
calendar_events	CREATE TABLE `calendar_events` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `eventDate` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `eventType` enum('holiday','commemorative','school_event','personal') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `isRecurring` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `color` varchar(7) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT '#3b82f6',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=480001
